Print No. 127. Engraving: "Explosion of the British Frigate, Guerriere, James R. Dacres, Esqr. Captn. and Rescue of the Prisoners, &c. the day after her Capture by the U.S. Frigate Constitution Isaac Hull Esqr. Commr. Friday 20th. August 1812."

Print No. 127. Engraving: "Explosion of the British Frigate, Guerriere, James R. Dacres, Esqr. Captn. and Rescue of the Prisoners, &c. the day after her Capture by the U.S. Frigate Constitution Isaac Hull Esqr. Commr. Friday 20th. August 1812."
The second of a pair of prints engraved by Benjamin Tanner after drawings by John James Barralet. Published Nov. 10, 1812 by B. Tanner, Philadelphia. First state. Monted on frame board.
